resources.string: The service saves battery by putting screen pixels in off state.\n\nFor this to work, you\'ll be prompted in the next screen to enable the \'drawing over other apps\' permission.
Please allow drawing on top of other apps, so that the service can start saving battery right away.
The service is now started.\nTo continue the tutorial, tap here or on any black area.
As you\'ve noticed, any tap on black will move the viewport there.\nGive it a try.
You can interact with your original content through the viewport, as usual.
Pressing the \'x\' button will quickly stop the service.\nTap on any black area to continue.
Enjoy this service and please send any suggestions of improvement using the GPlay review system :)
Welcome to the service that helps you save battery and gain more privacy when reading content on your device
Like? Then like also on Google Play!
Saved %1$d minutes worth of screen time!
